name: African-American Shakespeare Company
description: African-American Shakespeare Company provides classic theatre to a diverse audience, and opportunities and place for actors of color to hone their skills and talent in mastering classical roles. They produce work from all classical theatre works from Shakespeare and great American and world playwrights. They offer workshops and youth engagement programs at various locations through partnerships. These programs are generally run from 4:30 PM to 8 PM. Main office can be reached between 9 AM to 5 P
